description: Muscle studs Damien Crosse and Alex Marte spend an entire afternoon fucking each other on a rooftop in downtown Madrid, out in the open and under the sun with the whole city watching -- including Francesco D'Macho, who gets a close-up view with a pair of binoculars! But the police in Spain are cool guys -- rather than stop the shoot, they just asked the actors to hurry up with their cum shots! title: Addicted, Scene #01
